answer: You can keep track of your data usage using the below three options:
You will also be notified via SMS in the following cases:
There is no out of bundle data rating on the Nonstop Daily Plans.

question: Can I use the Nonstop Daily Plans on my BlackBerry?
answer: If you have a BB10 operating system and above you will be able to enjoy the Nonstop Daily Plans. Older BB operating system customers would not benefit from these plans.

question: 1. What is Data Booster?
answer: Etisalat understands your need for more data and introducing 2 new data boosters to offer you great value for money data boosters. Data boosters are one time data pack.

question: 2. What are the data boosters available now?
3. How I will be charged?
answer: You will be charged full and data allowance will be given in full irrespective of subscription date.

question: 4. Who are eligible to purchase data boosters?
answer: Any Postpaid customer, who is subscribed to any 1 GB or higher data pack, can purchase data booster.

question: 5. How I will be able to purchase data booster?
answer: You can purchase the data packs via sms, USSD, IVR, Mobile app

question: 6. Can I purchase multiple data boosters?
answer: Yes, you can purchase multiple data boosters.

question: 7. What happens if I do not use all my data allowance within the validity period?
answer: Any remaining MBs will automatically expire by end of bill cycle and will not be carried over.

question: 8. How can I monitor my remaining balance?
answer: You can keep track of your data usage using the below three options:
- Via SMS: SMS ‘DATA’ to 1010
- Via USSD: Dial *170#
- Via Etisalat UAE Mobile App
You will also be notified via SMS in the following cases:
- On consuming 80%, 90% and 100% of data boosters
- On consuming 80%, 90% and 100% of data boosters

question: 9. How I will be able to unsubscribe from data boosters?
answer: Data boosters are one-time packs .Data boosters will not renew automatically.

question: 10. What is the priority of data consumption?
answer: Your data will be consumed in the following way :
First, your data allowance in plan will be consumed, then if data allowance of any data pack you have purchased and then the data allowance of data booster.

question: 11. How many data units will I get for 1 GB package allowance?
answer: Etisalat follows uniform data allowance configuration across its packages, and your data units will be based on the below conversion

question: 12. How my data units will be consumed for package, and pay-as-you-go usage?
answer: When consuming data from a data package, your allowance will be deducted on the basis of 30 KB increments, whereas for pay-as-you-go data usage without any package, you will be rated on a 1 KB pulse.

question: What is the new Data Balance Transfer service?
answer:
The new Data Balance Transfer service allows you to transfer data from your own monthly allowance to any other Prepaid or Postpaid Etisalat number as below:

• Transfer in multiples of 100MB

• Transferred data will have 10 days validity

• AED 3/ 100MB Transfer Fee

• Maximum 5 transfers allowed per Month

• Allowed for monthly plans with 1GB data allowance or more
The flexibility and value that come with the Data Balance Transfer service are unmatched, as you can now transfer your unused data to your friends & family if they run out of data anytime.

question: Who can send or receive data using Data Balance Transfer?
answer: All Prepaid & Postpaid subscribers can use the Data Balance Transfer service. Postpaid customers need to have been using their connection for at least 3 months to be able to transfer.
Data Balance Transfer is not allowed for Visitors and Business customers.

question: How can I transfer data using this service?
answer:
You can transfer data to any Etisalat number using the below three options:

• Via USSD Direct Dial: Dial #100*Receiver-Number*Data-in-MB# to Transfer data

• For example, Dial #100*05XXXXXXXX*1000# to Transfer 1GB data to Receiver Number 05XXXXXXXX

•Via USSD Menu: Dial #100#

question: How will I be notified about the status of the Data Balance Transfer?
answer: Upon successful Data Balance Transfer, both you & the receiver will receive an SMS confirmation. In case of failed transaction, you will receive an SMS notification with the reason for failure.

question: Is there any limit on how much data I can transfer to others?
answer:
The following restrictions apply for Data Balance Transfer service:

• Successful Transactions Limit - 5 Per calendar Month

• Minimum MB Amount per Transaction – 100 MB

• Maximum MB Amount per Transaction

• Unlimited if you are sending from a prepaid line; 5GB if you are sending from a postpaid line

• Also, transfers are accepted as long as remaining allowance doesn’t dip below 100MB in your own plan

question: How will the Transferred Data Balance work?
answer:
The following rules apply on the Transferred Data Balance:

• Transferred data will have a fixed validity of 10 days

• There is no restriction for receivers on number, or value of data transfers – every transfer will have its own allowance and validity

• In case the receiver has other general volume based data plans [like 1GB, 5GB, 10GB plans], then consumption will be first from the transferred data balance and then from the other plans

• In case the receiver has only the transferred data balance, and the balance is depleted but still not expired, he/ she will be protected from out of bundle charges and data access will be blocked

• Lastly, transferred data may be re-transferred to others

question: How will the receiver track usage of the Transferred Data Balance?
answer: Receiver will be able to track usage from the transferred data balance via USSD by dialing *121*170#. He/ she will also be notified via SMS on consuming 100% of the transferred data allowance.

question: Can I block the Data Balance Transfer service on my mobile?
answer: Yes, you can. To block Data Balance Transfer service on your mobile, call Customer Care on 800101, or make a request at any of our Business Centers.

question: Will the Transferred Data Balance work on BlackBerry?
answer: If the receiver has a device with BlackBerry 10 operating system or higher, he/ she will be able to enjoy the Transferred Data Balance. Older BlackBerry customers would not benefit from this service.

question: Will the Transferred Data Balance work on Data SIMs?
answer: Yes, the Transferred Data Balance works on Data SIMs.

question: Will the Transferred Data Balance work while on Roaming?
answer: No, the Transferred Data Balance is for local usage only.

question: What is the NEW Daily Unlimited Social Data Plan?
answer: The NEW Daily Unlimited Social Data Plan offers all etisalat prepaid - Wasel customers daily unlimited access to Facebook, WhatsApp, BBM, Twitter and LinkedIn applications for only AED 2 a day.

question: What is the Monthly Unlimited Social Data Plan?
answer: The Monthly Unlimited Social Data Plan offers all Etisalat prepaid and postpaid customers monthly unlimited access to Facebook, WhatsApp, BBM, Twitter and LinkedIn applications for only AED 49 a month.

question: What can I do in these social applications?
answer: You can perform activities such as:
- Access Facebook to send messages, add friends, upload photos, update profile, like other's posts, etc.
- Use WhatsApp to chat, send and receive pictures, or videos and broadcast messages.
- Use Twitter to tweet, reply to a tweet, re-tweet, follow others, search for trending topics, etc.
- Log in to BBM to chat, create groups, share photos, update profile and broadcast messages
- Log into LinkedIn to view posts, posts updates, browse contacts, send messages
* External links to view articles, photos and videos will be blocked

question: How can I activate the Unlimited Social Data Plans?
answer: To activate the Daily Unlimited Social Data Plan just dial *170#, or SMS 'DSP' to 1010.
To activate the Monthly Unlimited Social Data Plan dial *170#, or SMS 'SP' to 1010.
Once the plan has been activated a confirmation SMS will be sent.

question: Do I have to activate the Unlimited Social Data Plans every day/ month?
answer: For the New Daily Unlimited Social Data Plan, once activated, you'll enjoy unlimited social access every day. The plan is automatically renewed every 24 hours, at the same time you first activated the plan. You'll stay subscribed to the plan until you deactivate. E.g. if you activate the plan at 7pm, the plan will remain active for 24 hours, and get renewed the following day at 7pm.
For the Monthly Unlimited Social Data Plan, once activated, you'll enjoy unlimited social access every month. The plan will be automatically renewed every 30 days.

question: Can I really use these social applications without any limit?
answer: Yes. You can use Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, BBM or LinkedIn on your smartphone or data device without having to worry about how much data you are using. You can use it as much as you like as long as your plan is active.

Please note that the download of the social applications and their updates are not part of the New Unlimited Social Data Plan. You will need to have a data pack or Wi-Fi access to be able to download the social applications and their updates to your smartphone or data device.

question: Can I Deactivate the plan?
answer: You can deactivate the Daily Unlimited Social Data Plan at any time by sending SMS 'C DSP' to 1010. Unlimited access to social applications that is part of this plan will be disabled.
Similarly, you can deactivate the Monthly Unlimited Social Data Plan by sending SMS 'C SP' to 1010.

question: Can I access the internet or watch a video if I subscribe to the Unlimited Social Data Plans?
answer: The Unlimited Social Data Plans are designed to cover all your social networking needs, if you wish to browse the internet or access any other specific application you need to activate a regular Data package.

question: Can I still enjoy my current prepaid tariff plan?
answer: Yes, you can continue to benefit from your existing tariff. Any social network data usage will first be consumed from your Unlimited Social Data Plan, and any usage beyond that will be consumed from other existing data allowance that you have.

question: I have an existing data plan - can I still activate the Unlimited Social Data Plans?
answer: Yes, you can still activate the Unlimited Social Data Plans even if you already have an existing data plan. All use of Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, BBM & LinkedIn will be unlimited as long as you have the plan active. All other data usage will be taken from your existing data plan.

question: Can I use the Unlimited Social Data Plans on my BlackBerry?
answer: If you have a BB10 operating system and above you can enjoy the Unlimited Social Data Plans. Older BB operating system customers would not be able to benefit from it.

question: Can I activate the Unlimited Social Data Plans if I am subscribed to the Free Social Data Promotion?
answer: If you are subscribed to the Free Social Data Promotion you will not be able to activate the Unlimited Social Data Plans. You will have to first unsubscribe from the promotion then try activating the new plan again. This is being done so that you are not charged for social data, since we are offering it for free as part of the promotion. Once the promotion is over, you can re-subscribe to any plan of your choice.

question: What happens if I don’t have enough balance in my account?
answer: First time subscription: You will have to recharge your wasel prepaid account and try activating the plan again.

Renewal: You will have a grace period of 3 days to recharge your account in order to continue enjoying the plan, after which the plan will be removed from your account. Once removed and you have enough balance, you will have to activate the plan again.

question: What is the Filipino Offer and who is eligible for it?

These rates are valid 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

question: What would be my call charges to other countries?
answer: The call charges to other countries would be as per your tariff plan or add on that you have subscribed to.

question: I am an existing Wasel customer, how would I be charged for my calls after I have opted into this Offer?
answer: Once you have opted-in this offer, all your calls to Philippines would be charged at 0.75 fils per second, for both per minute and per second billing customers. A call Set-up Fee of AED 1 will apply. All calls to other destinations and local calls would continue to be charged as per your tariff plan and billing pulse.

question: Are there any limitations or restrictions on the number of calls (or) the length of the call that I make to Philippines?
answer: There are no restrictions applicable with this offer. You can make as many calls as you wish for as long as you want.

and pressing the dial key

question: Can I opt out of the Filipino Offer?
answer: Yes, you can opt-out any time by
Dialling *140*4# and pressing the dial key
Once opted-out, you will be charged for calls to Philippines as per your existing tariff plan. You can opt-in again any time before end of the promotional period.

question: Are there any registration / subscription charges associated with this Filipino Offer?
answer: No, there are no registration / subscription charges associated with this Offer.

question: Once I have opted-into this Offer, can I change my tariff plan?
answer: You can migrate to any of Etisalat's available tariff plans by following the subscription process specific to that tariff plan or offer.

Even after subscription to another tariff plan, your subscription to the Filipino Offer will continue to exist and your calls to Philippines will be charged as per the Offer rates until the offer ends.

question: How can I access the WiFi Hotspots in UAE?

NEW USER
- Enter Etisalat WiFi zone (i.e. in a shopping mall)

- Cancellation between 2-3 months - Same month rental in full

question: Is my line with Wasel Special Premium Number valid for a lifetime?

question: Can WASEL Customers dial emergency numbers? Is there a charge for this?

question: Do we need to recharge our WASEL subscription before leaving the country?
answer: Yes. We recommend that your WASEL subscription is recharged prior to leaving the country and sufficient credit is available in your account to ensure that you receive incoming calls while roaming

question: How can we recharge our WASEL subscription while roaming from abroad?
answer: You can use any standard telephone in the country where you are roaming to recharge your WASEL subscription. Simply dial +9714004120. You will be prompted to enter your WASEL number and the Etisalat Prepaid Card Number

question: How can we check the available balance on our WASEL Service from abroad?
answer: You can check the available credit balance on your WASEL Service by simply dialing +9714004121 from any standard telephone available in the country where you are roaming and following the voice instructions.

question: Are the numbers +009714004120 and +009714004121 chargeable?
answer: Yes. Both these numbers are charged as per IDD rates.

question: Can WASEL customers receive incoming calls while roaming internationally?
answer: Yes.

question: Can WASEL customers make outgoing calls while roaming internationally?
answer: No. Currently this facility is not available.

question: Are there any charges for subscription to WASEL International Roaming Service?
answer: WASEL International Roaming Service has no deposit, connection, quarterly rental or activation charges. When you receive a call while roaming, your caller (from UAE/elsewhere) will pay the call charges for a call to the Etisalat Network and the user pays charges for the international rerouting of the call from the UAE to the country where you receive the call. An extra roaming surcharge is also applicable by that country and this could vary from 10% to 25%. Incoming Roaming Call Charges are as per the existing charges for normal GSM Roaming.

question: Can WASEL subscribers receive SMS messages while roaming?
answer: Yes. WASEL subscribers can receive SMS Text Messages FREE while roaming.

question: What is the New Wasel Plan and who is eligible for it?
answer: The New Wasel Plan is a prepaid mobile package from Etisalat.
Prepaid lines activated after the 12th of November 2012 will be automatically activated onto this tariff plan, while existing customers would have to opt for it.

question: How different is the New Wasel from the earlier Wasel plan?
answer: Calls made under New Wasel are charged on a "per second" basis; under the Wasel plan, calls are charged on a "per minute" basis. Therefore, if you are on the New Wasel plan, all your calls are charged to the exact second you talk for and not rounded off to the nearest minute. Moreover, international calls during off-peak hours made to a preferred country of your choice are charged at a discounted rate.

question: Is the New Wasel a temporary offer?
answer: No. The New Wasel is a permanent plan

question: Are there any registration/subscription charges associated with this tariff plan?
answer: No, there are no registration/subscription charges associated with this tariff plan.

question: How do I migrate to another plan?
answer: You can migrate to any of Etisalat's available plans by following the subscription process specific to that tariff plan.
Upon subscription to another tariff plan, the system will automatically cancel your subscription to the New Wasel.

question: I have purchased a New Wasel connection. Can I still subscribe to this plan?
answer: All prepaid lines activated after the 12th of November 2012 will be automatically activated onto the New Wasel plan.

question: What is the Visitor Line and who can benefit from it?
answer: Visitor Line is a new prepaid pack from Etisalat, exclusively designed for the visitors travelling to the UAE. Whether you are on a business trip or a tourist or a job seeker or just visiting family, the Visitor Line gets you connected immediately with a rich pack selection of your choice. You can enjoy benefits that suit your needs from:
- Data+ Wi-Fi pack (recommended for visitors on business)
- Voice & SMS pack (recommended for family/leisure visitors)
- Data, Voice, SMS pack (for the leisure/business visitor)

question: What are the benefits of the Visitor Line and how much do I pay?
answer: For just AED 100; about 27 US$, you can instantly connect with your friends and family back home during your stay with the choice of ONE of the suitable packs, which needs to be SELECTED AT TIME OF PURCHASING THE LINE. Each pack is valid for 14 days from the date of activating them.
The SIM card will be valid for 90 days and the validity can be extended for an additional period of 90 days for just AED 10.

question: What happens after 14 days? Can I recharge and use my Visitor Line?
answer:
Visitor pack is available at all Etisalat outlets. The pack is also available at all Airport arrivals, spanning Etisalat outlets & Duty free shops across Abu Dhabi, Dubai and Sharjah. The pack is also available in Etisalat business centres & outlets in malls.
To know the current balance of your pack, SMS VBB to 1012 or use the Etisalat Mobile App. Or you can simply recharge and use your Visitor Line.

You can recharge your Visitor Line using any of the following methods; which are available across more than 10,000 outlets across the UAE.

- Etisalat Mobile App; using your credit card

- eRecharge - any denomination; minimum from AED 5

- Recharge cards – available in denominations of 25,50,100,200 and 500

- eVoucher – available in denominations of 25,50,100,200 and 500

- Etisalat payment machines at over 1000 locations

To check your prepaid balance - use Etisalat Mobile App or dial *121# or call 121.

question: What will my rates be if I recharge and use my Visitor Line?
answer: In case you have opted not to subscribe to any of the packs above and just want to recharge and use your Visitor Line, you will be charged Pay-as-you-go rates,, which are listed below.

question: Where can I buy the Visitor Line?
answer: Visitor Line is available at Etisalat outlets and at all airport arrivals, covering Abu Dhabi, Dubai and Sharjah. It's also available in outlets in malls and other key touristic spots. Some outlets are listed below:

question: How long can I use my Visitor Line?
answer: You can use the Visitor Line for 90 days from the date of activation.

question: Can I retain my number, if I find a job and become a permanent resident of UAE?
answer: After 30 days from activation, just log onto the Etisalat Mobile App or dial *101# to upgrade to Wasel Prepaid service. You will retain the same number and up to AED 100 of your Visitor Line balance will be transferred. After which, please, visit the nearest Etisalat Business Centre to fulfill your UAE resident registration process, with valid identification documents.

question: Can I subscribe to other Etisalat tariff plans, bundles or promotions on Visitor Line?
answer: Visitor Line comes with its own rich set of exclusively designed packs and a hassle-free experience. Stay connected with your friends and family with the all-in-one Visitor Line. Simply choose a suitable pack and enjoy your stay in the UAE.

question: 9Will I be able to "Roam" with Visitor Line?
answer: Yes, you will easily be able to enjoy roaming services. While roaming, the visitor packs will not available. You will need to recharge your line and the standard roaming tariff will apply.

question: What is Wi-Fi service and how it is different than mobile data?
answer: Wi-Fi service is provided to access the Internet in certain areas wirelessly. These areas can be indoor or outdoor and are called Wi-Fi hotspots. There are two ways to connect to the Internet wirelessly, one is Wi-Fi, which is considered more economical but with limited coverage (within hotspot only) and the second is through a mobile network. A mobile network has wider coverage for mobile data or Internet connectivity.

question: Where is Etisalat Wi-Fi service available?
answer: Etisalat Wi-Fi service is available in major public areas including shopping malls, cafes, restaurants and parks (in process). Just search Etisalat Wi-Fi on your device and if you are in coverage areas you will get the Etisalat Network to login.

question: How can I manage my Visitor Line or get support?
answer:
You can conveniently manage your Visitor Line with Etisalat Mobile App:

- Check your balance and track your usage

- Subscribe instantly to a pack of your choice

- Get notifications when you are running out of minutes, data and SMS

- Recharge your line

- Live chat for support from our agents

Etisalat Mobile App works with iOS, Android, BB 10 OS and Windows. Download "Etisalat UAE" App now from your app store and enjoy maximized convenience.

Or

You can visit any of the Etisalat Business Centres or call 101 from your mobile for any help at any time.

question: What kind of Mobile Data Offers does Etisalat have for its Prepaid customers?
answer:
Etisalat offers all Prepaid Wasel customers the option to purchase one-time data packs, or auto-renewal data plans that give choice & value depending on the need.

Offers also include combo packs which include flexi minutes & local data, and other limited period one-time data packs.

For complete list of packages,

question: What are One-time Data Packs?
answer: One-time Data Packs place convenience before commitment, where you can subscribe multiple times to the same pack, or mix and match different ones, depending on your need. This way, you never run out of Data with the flexible short and long validity options.

question: What are Auto-renewal Data Plans?
answer: Auto-renewal Data Plans offer you peace of mind. No more hassle of re-subscribing to data every day, or month as these plans are automatically renewed at the end of assigned validity. Choose the plan you want and just ensure you have the right balance when it's time to renew and the plan will do the rest.

question: What’s the ‘Data Bonanza’ on Monthly Data Plus Packs?
answer: Etisalat understands your need for more data & is permanently upgrading allowances on all one-time & auto-renewal monthly data packages. Now with ‘Data Bonanza’ you’ll get up to 100% extra social data on Monthly Data Plus Packs.
The extra ‘Social Plus ’allowance will cover usage on Facebook, Messenger, WhatsApp , Twitter, WeChat, LinkedIn, Snapchat, Instagram, BOTIM* & C’Me*
* Social allowances may be used for messaging, for video and audio calling customer needs to subscribe to Internet Calling Plan (ICP)

question: How can I activate the Data Packs & Plans?
answer: For regular data packages & combos dial *170# for a choice of both one-time packs and auto-renewal plans. In addition, to explore other limited period one-time data packs dial *135#.

question: Do I have to activate the One-time Data Packs every time they expire?
answer: Yes, the one-time packs can be purchased as many times as you wish whenever needed. They can be purchased in addition to your exiting daily or monthly data plans. At the end of the validity period the packs will be expired and you would have to repurchase them again.

question: What happens in case of the Auto-renewal Data Plans?
answer: The auto-renewal plans do not need to be subscribed again and are renewed automatically at the end of the assigned validity.

question: Can I Deactivate these Packs & Plans?
answer: For the one-time packs there is no need to deactivate since you have already paid for the data allowance. Once validity expires the pack will be automatically removed from your prepaid line.
The auto-renewal plans can be deactivated from the USSD Menu *170#.

question: Can I purchase multiple Data Packs or Plans of the same category at the same time?
answer: Yes, you can purchase multiple one-time packs of the same category at the same time - each pack will have its own allowance and validity period.
Multiple subscription to auto-renewal plans will reset the renewal date, while both allowances will be available for usage.

question: What happens if I don't use all my data allowance within the validity period?
answer: Any remaining MBs will automatically expired and won't be carried over.

question: How can I monitor my remaining balance?
answer:
You can keep track of your data usage using the below three options:

- Via SMS: SMS 'DATA' to 1010

- Via USSD: Dial *170#

- Via Etisalat UAE Mobile App
You will also be notified via SMS in the following cases:

- On consuming 80%, 90%, and 100% of data packages

question: Can I use the Data Packs and Plans on my BlackBerry?
answer: If you have a BB10 operating system and above you can enjoy any of the data packs and plans. Older BB operating system customers would not be able to benefit from these.

question: What happens if I don't have enough balance in my account?
answer: - First time subscription: You will have to recharge your wasel prepaid account within 7 days, and the package will be activated automatically.

- Auto-Renewal: You will have a grace period of 10 days to recharge your account in order to continue enjoying the plan, after which the plan will be removed from your account. Once removed and you have enough balance, you will have to activate the plan again.

question: How many data units will I get for my package allowance?
answer: Etisalat follows uniform data allowance configuration across its packages, and your data units will be based on the below conversion:

question: How my data units will be consumed for package, and pay-as-you-go usage?
answer: When consuming data from a data package, your allowance will be deducted on the basis of 30 KB increments, whereas for pay-as-you-go data usage without any package, you will be rated on a 1 KB pulse.

question: 1. What are the data packs and how can I activate them?
answer:
* Note: all data packs mention above are one time.

Social Chat Includes - Facebook, Messenger, WhatsApp , Twitter, LinkedIn, BOTIM* & C’Me*

* Social allowances may be used for messaging, for video and audio calling customer needs to subscribe to Internet Calling Plan (ICP)
* Note: Social Data Packs are automatically renewed

Social Chat Includes - Facebook, Messenger, WhatsApp , Twitter, LinkedIn, BOTIM* & C’Me*

* Social allowances may be used for messaging, for video and audio calling customer needs to subscribe to Internet Calling Plan (ICP)

*Prices are subject of 5% VAT

question: 2. What are the BlackBerry data packs and how can I activate them?
3. How can I check the remaining allowances?
answer: You can Check your remaining allowances by dialing *101# and choose Option 1 - Account Management

question: Why do I have to register my number?
answer: This is a TRA policy for Consumer mobile customers to avoid the Fraud cases.

question: How will I know that I have to renew my Registration details?
answer: An SMS will be sent to you telling that the document details to have been expired and you need to renew it.

question: What will happen if I fail to renew my details?
answer: You will be given one grace period, after that the line will be TOSSED for a period of time, if you fail to renew the registration during that period then the line will be disconnected.

question: Am visiting UAE on a visitor visa, do I have to register my line?
answer: The visitor customers are given a line valid for 90 days only.

question: How many time do I have to renew my registration?
answer: You need to renew your registration every time your Identification expire.

question: Am using mobile number, & am owning a business in UAE but I don’t have residence visa, while am visiting the country from time to time, how can I renew my registration?
answer: You can send an email to care@etisalat.ae and providing a proof of your business along with a valid passport.

question: What are the acceptable document?
answer:
a) Valid Original UAE ID or

b) Valid Original Passport or

c) Valid Original GCC National ID

d) Additional document approved by TRA for limited time:

i.Labor Card

ii.Diplomat card

question: What is the registration policy means?
answer: This is a new Policy from the Telecom Regulatory Authority (TRA) in UAE, that require all SIM owner in UAE to register the SIM cards under their custody. This will ensure updating the subscriber profile at the operator with original and valid ID information.

question: Why should I register my line?
answer: Registration policy means that all Mobile owners must submit their valid approved document to the operator to ensure updating the profile of the customer. Customer must submit the document in person for proper verification.

question: As a subscriber, what will be the consequence if I don't register?
answer: In case the subscriber fails to register within the specified period after receiving the SMS notification, SIM card will be suspended for a period of 3 months. Then after the 3 months passes, the number will be ceased as per Etisalat policy for 3 months before Etisalat will be able to resell the number again to any customer.

question: Do I have to pay to register my line?
answer: Registration is FREE OF CHARGE.

question: Will my service be interrupted by this registration process?
answer: The service will not be affected/ Interrupted during the registration process in fact there will be only updating customer profile.

question: How long it will take to register my line?
answer: Customer ready with all his line will be processed within 10 minutes time, whereas customer who can't provide all his numbers, the process might take longer to ensure all his numbers are found and processed.

question: Should I submit my original documents or copy?
answer: Original valid document is required & copy of ID document as well. The Original document is required for verification during the registration process. Also copy of the original document will be retained for the record.

question: Will my number be changed when I register?
answer: Your mobile number will remain the same.

question: Can I do it for someone else?
answer: Yes, if you have the original power of attorney or letter from the owner of the SIM signed with his original valid approved ID. SIM owner representative can register the SIM card with his his/her original and valid ID along with the legal power of attorney/letter of delegation signed by the owner of the SIM card.

question: My SIM is not under my name, can I register the SIM?
answer: Yes, you can register the SIM that belong to you after the verification process with the sales staff. SIM holder can register the SIM card temporarily under their name, and for a period of 6 months, before the ownership of the SIM card is transferred permanently to the name of SIM CARD holder, provided the original owner does not claim it within this 6 months period.

question: I don't have my IDs with me, can I still register?
answer: No. Customers must provide original and valid ID to register his/ her SIM card.

question: Where can I register my line?
answer: All Etisalat Business Center, Service Center, and Outlets are equipped for the registration process across all UAE.

question: After registration, do I have to supply less document for replacement of SIM card or apply for new service?
answer: You have to present your Original ID for verification and signed application for any transaction as per the normal practice.

question: If am a user (age 18) using a postpaid SIM under parents name, will I be able to register it under my name?
answer: As long as you are at the legal age for a service (18 years for prepaid and 21 for postpaid) then you can apply for the registration of the SIM card under your custody, to be under your name.

question: If I have an existing SIM, I do not register my SIM, what status will it show in your system (active, suspended, non-active) and after what duration will status of SIM will change?
answer: It will show it as un-registered at this moment but when the customer receives an SMS to register the SIM card, then it will show under suspension for 3 months and then de-activated or ceased.

question: If I am outside the country and will not be back for a long time, can I register via email?
answer:
Etisalat contact center will guide you on the process of registration either via:

a) Calling from abroad to hold your SIM registration timeline until you comeback by dialing to +971 400444 101.

b) Or faxing a signed letter advising of the same to email 101@contactcentre.ae

c) Or sending representative with a letter signed from your side with your and the representative original ID (document).

question: If my line is disconnected due to non-registration while I was outside the country, can I reclaim back my number after proving that I was outside the country?
answer: Customer line will be suspended/ tossed for 3 months and then ceased as per Etisalat current policy which is 3 months before Etisalat will be able to resell the number to any customer

question: How long this Campaign will continue for?
answer: This campaign is expected to last for 18 months.

question: My Visa/ UAE ID has less than a month to expire; can I register my SIM card?
answer: Yes. You can register your SIM card but it will be valid for one year. However, we recommend that you renew your visa/UAE ID to have longer validity period as of the expiration date of the document.

question: Can I register online?
answer: The online registration is not available at this point of time.

question: Why new subscribers need to re-register?
answer: After July 17, 2012, all new subscribers will meet the TRA policy requirement automatically.

question: I have 3 numbers under my name, one for me, one for my wife and one for my son (who is under 18), should each of them register his/her number alone or I can still register those numbers under my name?
answer: You can still register those numbers under your name and you will be responsible for all the SIM cards.

question: I am a Prestige customer, do I have to register?
answer: Yes all customers required to register at any of Etisalat point of sales.

question: What is Mobile Number Portability (MNP)?
answer: Mobile Number Portability (MNP) is the process of transferring (porting) your mobile phone number from one mobile phone network provider to another. You may want to do this if you wish to sign up to a new mobile phone provider and keep your original mobile phone number, thus saving you the inconvenience of updating your contacts with your new telephone number.

question: How will you benefit from MNP?
answer: You are free to choose a new mobile service provider without having to change to a new number. You don't have to notify friends, family and associates about your new operator when you move to Etisalat or any other operator. Just use your phone like you always do.

question: What is porting of numbers?
answer: Porting of numbers is the actual switching of a mobile operator/mobile service provider without having to change one's mobile number. However, only active mobile numbers can be ported, so you do not have your number disconnected before porting.

question: What are the charges for porting a number? Are there any other charges applicable?
answer: Etisalat offers the MNP (Mobile Number Portability) facility free of charge.

question: How long does it take to port a number?
answer: The entire process of porting takes approximately 2 days. The time for porting a number also depends on the clearance from the donor operator (operator that you are leaving).

question: What do I need to keep in mind before joining/porting to Etisalat?
answer: All existing credit available to prepaid customers will expire upon successful porting and will not be carried forward.
Call charges, plans and VAS offered by Etisalat may differ from that offered by your earlier service provider.

question: Can I port my prepaid/postpaid number to Etisalat?
answer: Yes, you can port any prepaid or postpaid number to Etisalat. However, your credit in case of prepaid will lapse once the port in is successful.

question: What documents must a prepaid/postpaid customer submit while making a port in request to Etisalat?
What is the process to be followed to port my number to Etisalat?
answer: All you have to do is visit your nearest Etisalat Business Centre or outlet and apply for the service with a valid number and ID documents as mentioned above and Etisalat will take care of the rest.
Mobile Number Porting at Etisalat is offered as a "one-stop-shop" service. You do not have to visit the office of your previous operator. Etisalat will take care of the necessary formalities.

question: How can I get an Etisalat Porting Request Application form?
answer: Etisalat MNP forms are available at all Etisalat touch points; they can also be downloaded from the Etisalat website. (Click here to download the application Form)

question: Can I port a landline number?
answer: No, the service is applicable only to mobile services.

question: Do I have to change my SIM card to port my number to Etisalat?
answer: Yes. Etisalat will offer you a new SIM card when you apply for porting. Etisalat will activate the new SIM card with your existing number.

question: What will happen to the contacts in my SIM card?
answer: Your new SIM card will not have your old contacts. It is advised to back up your contacts from the old SIM to phone and then copy them on to the new SIM card.

question: How will I know if my porting request is completed or not?
answer: You will be notified once Etisalat activates the new SIM card. Your previous operator shall also notify you on the deactivation of the old SIM card soon after Etisalat activates the new SIM.
You will also be notified by means of SMS upon successful completion of your porting request.

question: When can I apply for a porting request?
answer: You can choose to apply for the service anytime between 8 am to 8 pm on any working day. Porting requests received between 8 am to 1 pm on working days only (Sunday to Thursday) will be processed the same day. However, some of our outlets work 24 hours, so you can submit your port in request at anytime, and our teams will process and verify your requests.

question: When will the application received after 1 pm be processed?
answer: The applications received after 1 pm will be processed during the next working day.

question: Is it compulsory to visit an Etisalat office to place the porting request?
answer: No. You can become an Etisalat customer without even visiting any of our offices. All you have to do is visit etisalat.ae and place a port request and we will deliver the SIM card at your doorstep. (This service is applicable to destinations within the UAE only.)

question: In case I have a balance due with my previous operator, can I still port in or out?
answer: Yes. Even if you have balance due, you will be able to place your porting request.

question: What is the ‘Call International, Pay Local' and who is eligible for it?
answer: The Call International Pay Local promotion is available for subscription for all Wasel-Prepaid customers. Upon successful subscription, customers can call 11 countries at the price of local calls (38 fils/min + call set up fee of AED 1.05).

question: What are the available countries included in this promotion?
answer: Here is a list of the countries included in the promotion:

question: Do I have to configure or select my preferred country from these countries to enjoy the special rates?
answer: No. Once you have opted into this add-on, you will automatically start enjoying these special rates for calls to the specified countries or operators.

question: How can I subscribe/unsubscribe to the “Call International Pay Local” offer?
answer: • Dial *111*1*2*2*1# to subscribe.
• Dial *111*1*2*2*2# to unsubscribe.

question: What is the Credit Plus/ International Plus? And how do I benefit from it?
answer: - Credit Plus gives you up to 30% extra credit in addition to the value of the recharge card. The total credit (Recharge value + Extra credit) can be used for any kind of usage within the specified validity period. All Credit Plus balance will be consumed at Standard Wasel Rates.

- International Plus gives you up to 60% extra international credit, in addition to the value of the recharge card. The total credit (Recharge value + Extra credit) can be used for any kind of International usage within the specified validity period.

question: Can I have 'Credit Plus, ‘International Plus, as well as standard recharge balances at the same time? And how will I know about the balance status?
answer: Yes you can have all three types of balances at the same time. For balance enquiry, you can dial below:

question: If I have only 'International Plus' balance, can I make local calls and SMSs?
answer: 'International Plus' balance can only be used for International voice calls, video calls and SMS from UAE. If you wish to make a local call please recharge your account using standard recharge or "Credit Plus" option.

question: If I am a 'Call International Pay Local customer'. Can I also recharge using 'International Plus' option and use it?
answer: Yes you can recharge using the International Plus option. All your international calls will first be consumed from your international plus balance at standard rates followed by your main balance (If your calls are to any of the 11 CIPL countries, you will be charged as per CIPL rates, else you will be charged as per your tariff plan)

question: If I have only 'Credit Plus' can I make international calls with it?
answer: Yes, If you have 'Credit Plus' balance, you can use it for local and international calls and SMS.

question: What happens if I recharge with 'International Plus' more than once?
answer: If you do multiple recharges of International Plus, the credit gets accumulated and the greater of the validity periods is assigned.

question: What happens if I recharge with the 'International Plus' option but I don’t use the credit within the specified period?
answer: You will lose the unused 'International Plus' balance if it is not used within the validity period unless another 'International Plus' recharge is done before the validity period is over.

question: How will the balances be used when I use my prepaid line?
answer: The balances will be used in the following order: 1. International Plus 2. Credit Plus 3. Main balance

question: What is Etisalat Credit Transfer service?
answer: Etisalat Credit Transfer service is a new service that gives you the convenience of transferring credit/balance from your Postpaid or Prepaid account to another Prepaid account

question: How can I subscribe or activate the Etisalat Credit Transfer service?
answer: The Etisalat Credit Transfer facility is available to all active Prepaid and Postpaid accounts. No registration or subscription is required to use the service.

question: How do I send credit from one account to another account?
answer: Transferring credit from your account to another account is very easy and quick.
Just type the following command on your mobile screen (not as a SMS) and press the send key: *Credit transfer Service Code * Mobile number * Amount to be transferred # followed by the Send key.

The credit transfer code for the credit transfer service is 100. For example, if you want to transfer AED 13 to a mobile number 050 123 4567, you need to Send the following command: *100 * 050 123 4567 * 13 #

question: What message will I get after sending the Credit Transfer command?
answer: After sending the Credit Transfer command, you will receive a message confirming the transaction details and requesting you to press 1 to confirm and 2 to cancel.

question: What will happen if I will press 1 to confirm?
answer: On confirming the credit transfer, the recipient will receive the credit in their account and you will receive a message confirming the transfer and stating the balance in your account after the transfer.

question: What will happen if I press 2 to cancel?
answer: On cancelling the Credit Transfer, the recipient will not receive any credit in their account and you will receive a message confirming the cancellation and stating the balance in your account.

question: How will the recipient find out that the credit transfer has been credited to their account?
answer: On receiving the credit, the recipient will receive a message indicating the amount transferred to his account from your mobile number and the current balance following credit in his/her account.

question: How will the recipient be notified if the credit/balance transfer to their account has been cancelled?
answer: Upon cancelling the credit/balance transfer, the recipient will not be notified.

question: Who can use the Etisalat Credit Transfer service?
answer: All Postpaid and Wasel Prepaid customers ca use this service to transfer credit. All Etisalat prepaid customers with active and working accounts can receive the credit

question: Can I transfer credit from my Prepaid Wasel or Ahlan accounts to other GSM Postpaid accounts?
answer: No. At the moment, the credit can be transferred only to prepaid accounts.

question: Can I transfer credit from my temporarily disconnected Prepaid Wasel or Ahlan account to other accounts?
answer: No. Credit/balance transfer is not possible from temporarily disconnected accounts.

question: Can I transfer credit from my active Prepaid account to a Tossed Prepaid Account?
answer: Yes. You can transfer credit to Tossed Prepaid accounts. This will help you to renew your Tossed account.

question: Can I transfer credit from my ceased Prepaid account to other accounts?
answer: No. The transfer of credit is not possible from ceased accounts.

question: Can I get back the transferred balance by making a request to Etisalat?
answer: No. The customer is wholly responsible for any balance transfer transaction, similar to the policy of making calls or sending SMS. The transferred credit is not refundable to the sender. The system will give you an option to confirm before transferring the balance. You can check and verify the number to which you are transferring credit before confirming the transaction.

question: What if the transferred balance did not reach the recipient and has been deducted from my account?
answer: In such cases you may approach an Etisalat office or can call Customer Care on 101. An investigation will be done and in the case of an Etisalat system failure, the amount will be credited back to the donor

question: Can I transfer credit from my active account to a prepaid active account while I am roaming abroad?
answer: Yes, but subject to the availability of sending the Etisalat Credit Transfer command in that particular country.

question: Can I transfer credit from my active account to a prepaid active account which is roaming abroad?
answer: Yes. You can transfer the credit to the UAE active prepaid account which is roaming abroad.

question: What is the minimum amount that I can transfer?
answer: The minimum amount of transfer per transaction is AED 2

question: What is the maximum amount that I can transfer?
answer: The maximum amount of transfer per transaction is AED 150

question: What is the limit on total number of transactions per day?
answer: There is no limit on the total number of transaction per day. However, the total credit being transferred should not exceed the total amount of AED 150 per day

question: What is the maximum amount that I can transfer in one month?
answer: The maximum amount of credit that can be transferred in a month is AED 1,500 for Prepaid and AED 500 for Postpaid

question: Is it mandatory to transfer credit in multiples of AED 5 in each transaction?
answer: No. The minimum credit transferred should be AED 2 and the maximum is AED 150 per day. However, any amount (not decimal) in between these figures can be transferred

question: What will happen if I try to transfer the credit after crossing my daily or monthly limits?
answer: The system will not accept your request and you will be informed via an SMS that your request cannot be processed.

question: What is Deal of the Day?
answer: With Etisalat's Deal of the day, You can enjoy a special offer every day. You need to dial *050# or send DEAL to 1204 in order to know your Deal of the Day offer. On dialing *050# you will receive a sms from sender id 1204 communicating the offer. To avail of the offer you need to reply to the sms by sending "YES"

question: Who is eligible for Deal of the Day?
answer: All Wasel prepaid customers are eligible for Deal of the Day.
Deal of the Day is not available for Postpaid/Enterprise and Five Sim customers.

question: How can the customer subscribe to the Deal of the Day offer?
answer:
• dial *050# or send DEAL to 1204

• You will receive sms (from sender id 1204) which will carry the offer the customer is eligible for

• Reply to the message by sending YES to subscribe to the offer. You will receive a confirmation message confirming that the offer is activated

question: How many offers can the customer subscribe to every day?
answer: You can subscribe to only one offer daily. The offer is valid only for that day.
In order to get and subscribe to a new offer you have to dial *050# or send DEAL to 1204 again the next day

question: What will be the validity of the offers that I receive?
answer: For the Recharge credit offer, Recharge credit is valid for 7 days, for the discounted packs the validity will depend on the type of pack that you.

question: How can I check the balance and/or expiry date of the bonus?
answer: On activation of your offer, you will receive the confirmation message. This message will have the ussd code that you have to dial in order to know the expiry of the free minutes/offers.
Example – Dear Customer, You have received 30 Local minutes valid for today. To check your minutes balance dial *121*37#.

question: What is the validity of the special offers that customers receive from Deal of the Day?
answer: The validity of the offers depends on the type of offer the customer subscribes. The validity of the offer will be mentioned in the offer sms.
Example - Dear Customer, You have received 15 International minutes valid for 7 days. To check your minutes balance dial *121*35#.

question: Is there a limit to the number of offers I can subscribe to?
answer: No, there is no limit to the number of offers you can subscribe to. But you will receive and can subscribe to only one offer in a day. In order to subscribe to another offer, you need to dial *050# again the next day to get and subscribe to a new offer.

question: Which countries can be called using the International Calling Offers available as the Deal of the Day?
answer: Please refer to the
to know about the countries you can call.

question: What are the local minute calling bundles and who is eligible for it?
answer: The local calling bundles are daily bundles of local minutes offered at lower rates. These bundles are available to all Wasel customers.
When you make the first local call after subscription:
• The rental for the bundle will be deducted
• The minutes included in the bundle will be credited to your account
• Once you have used up all the bundle minutes for the day, local calls will be charged at the tariff plan rates for the rest of the day
• International calls will also be charged as per your tariff plan
You do not have to subscribe to the bundle every day. It will automatically be assigned to you once you make the first local call of the day.

question: How can I subscribe to these bundles?
answer:
You can subscribe to the bundles by:

a) dialling *111# and choosing the relevant options.

b) Sending an SMS to 1010 as follows:
Once you have been successfully opted-in, you will receive an SMS from Etisalat confirming the same.

On the day of subscription, the benefits of the bundle will be applicable from the next local call made after you receive the confirmation SMS.

On subsequent days, the benefits of the bundle will be applicable from the first local call you make for the day.

question: Which numbers can be called using these bundled minutes?
answer: You can use these minutes to call any UAE landline or mobile number (Etisalat and du).
Calls to local premium numbers are not part of these bundles. Such calls will be charged as per your tariff plan.

question: How long will these minutes in the bundles be valid for?
answer: The bundle of minutes is valid for the day. Unused minutes (if any) will expire at the end of the day (midnight).
A new bundle will be added to your account the next day as and when you make the first local call for the day.

question: How are these local bundles beneficial?
answer:
With these bundles you can enjoy a lower rate per minute for your local calls.

• Discounted rate - On calls to any mobile or landline in the UAE

- 44% savings on the Daily 5 minute and the Daily 10 minute bundles compared to standard local call rates

- 63% savings on the Daily 30 minute bundle compared to standard local call rates

• Pay only on days you use — automatic renewal of bundle only on days you make local calls

• Affordable rentals with bundled minutes to suit your needs

• No extra charges/fees applicable

question: Will I be charged for the bundle every day even if I don’t make any local calls?
answer: No. You will be charged for the bundle only on days on which you make a local call.
If you do not make any local call during a day, there will be no charge for these bundles.

question: How will I be charged for my local calls once I have subscribed to one of these bundles?
answer:
• If you have subscribed to the 10 minute bundle, AED 2 will be deducted from your balance for the bundle and your account gets credited with 10 local minutes, once you make a local call

• After you have used up these 10 minutes, your calls from the 11th minute for the day, would be charged as per your tariff plan

• On days when you do not make any local calls, you would not be charged AED2

question: How will I be charged if I do not have sufficient balance to cover the daily bundle rental?
answer: In case you do not have the necessary balance to cover the bundle rental, your calls will be charged as per the standard Wasel tariff plan.
Once you have sufficient balance in your account, the rental will be deducted and the bundle minutes will be credited upon your next call of the day.

question: Once I use up all the daily minutes in the bundle, can I subscribe to the bundle again to get more minutes?
answer: Multiple subscriptions within the same day are not possible. However, there are two bundles to choose from; you can subscribe to any bundle that suits your usage pattern.
Once you have used up all the bundle minutes for the day, local calls will be charged at the tariff plan rates for the rest of the day.

question: Are there any registration/subscription charges associated with this offer?
answer: No, there are no registration/subscription charges associated with this offer. You will only be charged the daily rental for the bundle on days when you make a local call.

question: How can I upgrade or downgrade my Bundle?
answer: To upgrade/downgrade your bundle, just subscribe to the new bundle of your choice. The subscription for that bundle will come into effect from the next day.
You can upgrade/downgrade/subscribe /unsubscribe only once a day and this will be effective from the next day.

question: How do I check on the minutes balance of my bundle?
answer: For enquiry related to this bundle, dial *101*1*2# and choose the relevant options.

question: Is this a temporary offer?
answer: No, this is a permanent offer.

question: Can I opt out of this offer?
answer:
Yes, you can opt-out any time. To opt-out, you can either:

a) dial *111# and choose the relevant options OR

b) Send the following SMS to 1010
Once you opt-out, you will be charged for all local calls as per your tariff plan.

You can opt-in any time again, by dialling *111# and choosing the relevant options.

question: What are the Monthly Combo Packs?
answer: The Monthly Combo packs are comprehensive packs containing voice minutes and data that serve the needs of light, medium, and high-end users. Wasel-Prepaid customers can choose the package that suits them the best and save on their monthly spends.
*Flexi Minutes are applicable for Local &  International calls. International calls are applicable to call
. Any additional minutes will be charged at regular rates.

question: How can I activate the Monthly Combo Packs?
answer: To activate it, just dial *170*6# and choose Combos. Once activated, you’ll receive an SMS confirmation.

question: What’s the duration of the subscription and validity period of the pack?
answer: Once activated, you’ll enjoy the plan benefits for 30 days. The plan will be automatically renewed every month.

question: Can I Deactivate the pack?
answer: You can deactivate your Monthly Combo plan anytime by dialing *170*6# and choosing Combos. The remaining allowances will remain valid until their expiry time.

question: What is Create your Number service ?
answer: It is a new online channel to buy postpaid lines with the facility to search and customise your postpaid number.

question: How many packs can be purchased per day?
answer: You can activate as many packs as you wish. Each pack will have its own allowance as well as validity period. If you use all your included allowance before the end of the validity period, the remaining usage will be charged as per your recharge type / current tariff plan unless you purchase a new pack.

question: Can I still enjoy my current prepaid tariff plan?
answer: Yes, you can continue to benefit from your existing tariff. All your flexi minutes, data and social data usage will first be consumed from your monthly combo pack’s allowance. Any usage beyond that will be consumed as per standard rates from your International Plus Balance, followed by your Credit Plus Balance, followed by your Main Account balance as per your existing tariff plan rate.

question: What happens if I don’t use all my units within the 30 days?
answer: Any unused Minutes or Data allowance will automatically expire and can’t be carried over.

question: How can I find out my remaining balance?
answer: After each call, you’ll receive an SMS containing details of your remaining minutes. For data, you’ll receive an SMS once you’ve used all your allowance. You can also check your remaining balance at any time by dialing *170*6#, and choosing Combo Balance.

question: Can I use the Monthly Combo Packs on my BlackBerry?
answer: If you are a Blackberry customer, you can use the flexi minutes as usual. However, to get the benefit of the data allowance, you need to have a BB10 operating system and above.

answer: You can call
with the International Minutes Packs.

answer: You will have to recharge your wasel prepaid account and activate.

question: Who is eligible to use Multi-SIM?
answer: Multi SIM service is applicable for Consumer plans (Postpaid and Prepaid) only. Multi SIM service is not applicable for Business customers.

question: If I am a ported-in customer, can I use Multi-SIM?
answer: Yes

question: Where can I get the Multi-SIM Service?
answer: Visit any of the

question: Does my tariff plan matter?
answer: The subscription to Multi SIM SIMs is independent of the main primary package subscribed by the customer.

Example: if main SIM is data-only SIM then all cloned SIMs will be data-only as well. If customer has New Postpaid on his main SIM then all minutes, SMS, data packs etc. will also be available on cloned SIMs

question: Does Multi-SIM support all networks?
answer: Multi-SIM works on all types of networks (2G, 3G, and 4G).

question: What type of SIM cards work with Multi-SIM?
answer: All SIM card types are supported - The customer will have the flexibility of adding/removing SIM cards and changing their type (mini/micro/nano SIM).

question: How many additional SIM cards can I get?
answer: For Postpaid Customers:
- You can get 4 additional SIM cards (all types of SIM cards)
For Prepaid customers:
- You can get 1 additional SIM card.

question: What services will work on Multi-SIM?
answer: All services including roaming will be applicable on SIMs (primary + clones):
a. Voice, data, SMS etc. will be active on all SIMs simultaneously
b. Excluding receiving voice calls – it will be enabled only on one SIM at a time
c. Excluding BlackBerry service – it will be active only on one SIM at a time

question: What happens if I subscribe to a data package?
answer: If a customer adds a data package to its primary service, then the data will be shared among all the SIMs part of the Multi SIM service.

question: What happens is I migrate my Main SIM?
answer: If a customer migrates from Post-paid to Prepaid Service or Vice-versa:
The Multi SIM service will be deactivated when a customer requests for migration of service.

question: What happens is if want to change my Main SIM package or tariff plan?
answer: If the customer wants to upgrade/downgrade the data package or the primary service, then it does not have any effect on the Multi SIM service.

For example, if the customer wants to migrate from the 1GB plan to a 5GB plan, then the data + voice as per the new plan that customer migrates to, is shared between all the SIMs subscribed by the customer.

question: What are the codes to operate my Multi-SIM Service?
I am a postpaid customer, how much will Multi-SIM cost me?
answer: All charges will be added to customer’s bill.
Monthly rental is applied on pro-rated basis (for example if the customer activates service on 15 April, then the customer needs to pay only for remaining 15 days of April)
If the customer de-activates the service, there will be no refund for unused time during the month

question: I am a prepaid customer, how much will Multi-SIM cost me?
answer: Rental charges are deducted in full from prepaid balance upfront.
If rental deduction fails, then Multi-SIM service will be suspended. Customer will have to manually re-activate service after toping up account with required amount.
If Multi-SIM service is suspended, only the clone SIM will be affected.
If customer de-activates and re-activates his service, he will be charged the monthly rental in full - no pro-rating.

question: How can I make and manage my new Plan?

question: Will I still be able to use the service if the bill amount is not paid by the due date?
answer: Etisalat has put in place a number of SMS reminders starting from a Mini-Statement Bill, to a warning SMS before disconnecting the service and following the legal collection process. In the event of missed payment of dues on your Mobile Postpaid account, Etisalat would follow different processes to remind and recover the dues.

The process goes through a stepped approach, starting with an initial suspension of video calls functionality, followed by suspending outgoing voice calls and SMS and finally, a full suspension of all services which is suspending incoming calls, SMS and data communication.

question: Can I choose multiples of the same saving pack?
answer: Yes, you can choose to have multiples of the same saving pack, up to 10 saving packs per type.

question: How can I manage my Saving Packs?
answer:
You can add/remove and increase/decrease any of the Saving Packs anytime during the month.

To do so, you can use 7 channels:

- USSD *140#

– download Etisalat Mobile App

– IVR 125

- Etisalat call center 101

- Online

- Etisalat stores

- SMS

When you add any of the Saving packs in the middle of the month, the rental is charged on pro rata basis and the allowance is provided in pro rata basis. For example: a customer adds one local minute saving pack in 15th of the month; the customer is charged only AED 25 and gets 100 minutes.

When you remove any of the Saving packs in the middle of the month, the rental is not refunded and the remaining allowances will be kept for usage until the end of the month and will be removed as of the coming month.

question: Will the International minutes saving pack be applied to all countries?
answer: The International Minutes Saving Pack will be applied to most of the countries; however, there is a blacklist of countries that this will not be applied to. Please, visit
for more details.

question: Will the Incoming Roaming Saving Pack be applied to all operators?
answer: The Incoming Roaming Minutes Saving Pack will be applied to most of the operators; however, there is a blacklist of operators that this will not be applied to. Please, visit
for more details.

question: How can i benefit from the free minutes to preferred numbers?
answer:
You need to activate the preferred number/s by SMS

To activate, SMS: 'ACT NAT number' to 1012

To Change, SMS: 'Change NAT number' to 1012

Number must be entered in full format. i.e. 97150xxxxxx

Number can be changed only once a month. AED 25 charge applies.

The preferred number can be any number in UAE. (Both landline or mobile from any network).

question: Is the preferred number on any specific plan?
answer: The preferred number option is available on Plans 300, 600 and 1000. You can choose any number of your choice in the UAE (mobile or landline) and speak for 5 hours (300 minutes) for FREE, every month.

question: Are these free minutes in addition to the Flexi Minutes?
answer: Yes, the free minutes to one preferred number are in addition to the flexible minutes that you enjoy on your Plan.

question: What do I need to do to enjoy this preferred number?
answer: This special benefit is already available on the Plans 300, 600 and 1000. All you need to do is set your preferred number.

question: How do I set my preferred number?
answer:
You can set your preferred number via:

SMS: ACT NAT Preferred Number to 1012

*Preferred number can be any national number, mobile or landline and must be entered along with the country code 971. E.g.: 97150xxxxxx, 9712xxxxxxx

							
:

Entering the country code is mandatory.

There should not be any space in the number.

question: How will I know that the preferred number is set?
answer: You will receive an SMS confirming successful setting of your preferred number.

question: Can I change my preferred number?
answer:
You can change your preferred number once during the month at a fee of AED25. Change of number will be with immediate effect. You will receive an SMS confirming successful change of your number.
You can change your number via:

SMS: Change NAT old preferred number and new preferred number’ to 1012

For example: the old preferred number is 0501234567 and the new number is 0507654321 then type 'Change NAT 0501234567 0507654321'

If you are changing the preferred number during the month, your free minutes allowance will not be reset. Your total free allowance of 300 minutes will remain unchanged during the bill cycle.

question: From which free allowance are the calls to my preferred number charged?
answer:
Calls to your preferred number are free up to the first 300 minutes.

If you use more, it will then be depleted from your flexible minutes.

Once you use up both your preferred number minutes and flexible minutes, you will be charged at standard national rates.

question: How will I know that I have used my minutes for the preferred number or any other usage?

question: What happens to my preferred number if I change my plan?
answer: As long as you are changing to one of Plans 300, 600 or 1000 plan, your preferred number will be automatically migrated. If you choose any other plan, you'll lose the benefits of the preferred number and will be charged at regular national calling rates.

question: Why do I have to register my number?
answer: This is a TRA policy for Consumer mobile customers to avoid the Fraud cases.

question: How will I know that I have to renew my Registration details?
answer: An SMS will be sent to you telling that the document details to have been expired and you need to renew it.

question: What will happen if I fail to renew my details?
answer: You will be given one grace period, after that the line will be TOSSED for a period of time, if you fail to renew the registration during that period then the line will be disconnected.

question: Am visiting UAE on a visitor visa, do I have to register my line?
answer: The visitor customers are given a line valid for 90 days only.

question: How many time do I have to renew my registration?
answer: You need to renew your registration every time your Identification expire.

question: What is Mobile Number Portability (MNP)?
answer: Mobile Number Portability (MNP) is the process of transferring (porting) your mobile phone number from one mobile phone network provider to another. You may want to do this if you wish to sign up to a new mobile phone provider and keep your original mobile phone number, thus saving you the inconvenience of updating your contacts with your new telephone number.

question: How will you benefit from MNP?
answer: You are free to choose a new mobile service provider without having to change to a new number. You don't have to notify friends, family and associates about your new operator when you move to Etisalat or any other operator. Just use your phone like you always do.

question: What is porting of numbers?
answer: Porting of numbers is the actual switching of a mobile operator/mobile service provider without having to change one's mobile number. However, only active mobile numbers can be ported, so you do not have your number disconnected before porting.

question: What are the charges for porting a number? Are there any other charges applicable?
answer: Etisalat offers the MNP (Mobile Number Portability) facility free of charge.

question: How long does it take to port a number?
answer: The entire process of porting takes approximately 2 days. The time for porting a number also depends on the clearance from the donor operator (operator that you are leaving).

question: What do I need to keep in mind before joining/porting to Etisalat?
answer: All existing credit available to prepaid customers will expire upon successful porting and will not be carried forward.
Call charges, plans and VAS offered by Etisalat may differ from that offered by your earlier service provider.

question: Can I port my prepaid/postpaid number to Etisalat?
answer: Yes, you can port any prepaid or postpaid number to Etisalat. However, your credit in case of prepaid will lapse once the port in is successful.

question: What documents must a prepaid/postpaid customer submit while making a port in request to Etisalat?
What is the process to be followed to port my number to Etisalat?
answer: All you have to do is visit your nearest Etisalat Business Centre or outlet and apply for the service with a valid number and ID documents as mentioned above and Etisalat will take care of the rest.
Mobile Number Porting at Etisalat is offered as a "one-stop-shop" service. You do not have to visit the office of your previous operator. Etisalat will take care of the necessary formalities.

question: How can I get an Etisalat Porting Request Application form?
answer: Etisalat MNP forms are available at all Etisalat touch points; they can also be downloaded from the Etisalat website. (Click here to download the application Form)

question: Can I port a landline number?
answer: No, the service is applicable only to mobile services.

question: Do I have to change my SIM card to port my number to Etisalat?
answer: Yes. Etisalat will offer you a new SIM card when you apply for porting. Etisalat will activate the new SIM card with your existing number.

question: What will happen to the contacts in my SIM card?
answer: Your new SIM card will not have your old contacts. It is advised to back up your contacts from the old SIM to phone and then copy them on to the new SIM card.

question: How will I know if my porting request is completed or not?
answer: You will be notified once Etisalat activates the new SIM card. Your previous operator shall also notify you on the deactivation of the old SIM card soon after Etisalat activates the new SIM.
You will also be notified by means of SMS upon successful completion of your porting request.

question: When can I apply for a porting request?
answer: You can choose to apply for the service anytime between 8 am to 8 pm on any working day. Porting requests received between 8 am to 1 pm on working days only (Sunday to Thursday) will be processed the same day. However, some of our outlets work 24 hours, so you can submit your port in request at anytime, and our teams will process and verify your requests.

question: When will the application received after 1 pm be processed?
answer: The applications received after 1 pm will be processed during the next working day.

question: Is it compulsory to visit an Etisalat office to place the porting request?
answer: No. You can become an Etisalat customer without even visiting any of our offices. All you have to do is visit etisalat.ae and place a port request and we will deliver the SIM card at your doorstep. (This service is applicable to destinations within the UAE only.)

question: In case I have a balance due with my previous operator, can I still port in or out?
answer: Yes. Even if you have balance due, you will be able to place your porting request.

question: What is Autopay?
answer: Autopay service is a great way to pay Etisalat's postpaid bills automatically on due date with complete confidence and security through your personal credit card.
You can now enjoy the convenience of paying your Etisalat’s postpaid bills automatically through a credit card. It only requires a one-time registration.

question: How can I enroll for Autopay?
answer: Simply log on to Etisalat Online Services website
and register your credit card details. Enjoy peace of mind by paying your bills on time.
If you have an Etisalat Online Services user ID, you will be able to register your Etisalat postpaid account.

If you do not have an Etisalat Online Services user ID, you can still use Autopay service by simply logging on to www.etisalat.ae/online and registering any of your Etisalat accounts - either mobile, fixed line, Al Shamil and eLife easily and quickly.
After successful online registration and log in, you need to register you Credit Card details against the registered account with Etisalat Online Services.
Alternatively fill-up your credit card  details in the
and submit to nearest Etisalat Store/ Business centre.

question: What are the benefits of subscribing to Etisalat Autopay?
answer: One time registration; thereafter you need not worry about remembering to pay Etisalat bills on time.
A Safe, convenient and efficient way of paying Etisalat’s bills such as mobile services (Postpaid), Fixed-line, Al Shamil and eLife.

question: Is there any charges to register for Auto Pay and any monthly debits?
answer: No, there are no charges.

question: Which credit card types can I use to set up Autopay?
answer: You can register for Autopay using a Visa or MasterCard credit card.

question: What bills can I pay using Autopay?
answer: You can pay your Etisalat mobile services (Postpaid), Fixed-line, Al Shamil and eLife.

question: When will be the charging date once Autopay is activated?
answer: The monthly debit will be 15
of every month. Single date of charging.

question: Is there any minimum and maximum limit for Autopay?
answer: The minimum bill payment amount is AED 10 and maximum amount is AED 5000 per transaction.

answer: All you need to do is login to
and update your credit card details.
Alternatively you may visit any nearby
for assistance.

answer: All you need to do is login to
and cancel your subscription.
Alternatively you may visit any nearby
for assistance.

question: What is the New Postpaid Combo Add-On?

Now there are 9 Add-ons or saving packs that New Postpaid customers can choose from.

1. USSD

Dial the add-on menu *140#

Also, managing the add-on is possible through the unified menu *101#

2. IVR

Dial IVR 125 and follow the instruction

question: Can I activate different types of Add-ons?
answer: Yes, you have the freedom of activating and mixing different types of add-ons you choose. You can subscribe and cancel at any time during the month. Pro-rated rental and allowances will be applied in case you subscribe during the month.

Add-on subscription is automatically renewed at the beginning of every month. If you deactivate an add-on in the middle of the month, the rental is not refunded and the remaining allowances will be kept to use until end of the month and will be removed from start of next month.

question: What are the Preferred Number rules?
answer: • Preferred number can be any active etisalat mobile number.
• It will not be possible to deactivate the preferred number in the Combo Add-on alone. Customer need to deactivate the whole Combo add-on if wishes to delete the preferred number.

question: How can I check the remaining allowance in my balance?
answer:
1. Postpaid Add-ons USSD *140# “balance inquiry menu”

2. Etisalat mobile app “my usage menu”

3. USSD *101#

question: Are the Combo Add-on flexible minutes applicable for making calls to all countries?
